name: part_002
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs her song "Gekka Gika Kyoku" on a grand stage.
A transition featuring a narration and illustrations of a mysterious book.
Shirakami Fubuki and Omaru Polka perform the song "CIRCUS PANIC!!!" in a circus-themed arena.

subtitles.original: 皆が指差し笑おうとも我は笑わない！
subtitles.english: Even if everyone points and laughs, I won't laugh!

subtitles.original: 正直に生きるお前が貶なされて
subtitles.english: You who live honestly are disparaged,

subtitles.original: 嘘で生きる奴らが徳となる世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where those who live by lies prosper,

subtitles.original: 我だけはお前の腕を離さない！
subtitles.english: I alone will not let go of your arm!

subtitles.original: 時を刻み忘れようとも我は離さない！
subtitles.english: Even if time forgets to tick, I won't let go!

subtitles.original: 我は忘れない！
subtitles.english: I will not forget!

subtitles.original: 身を粉にして働いても
subtitles.english: Even if I work myself to the bone,

subtitles.original: 感謝されないことも…
subtitles.english: There are times I'm not thanked...

subtitles.original: 「自己犠牲」を受け容れても
subtitles.english: Even if I accept "self-sacrifice",

subtitles.original: 限界がもうやってくるから
subtitles.english: The limit is already approaching,

subtitles.original: 自分を大事に愛せばいい
subtitles.english: So it's fine to treasure and love yourself.

subtitles.original: それは他人を愛すること
subtitles.english: That is loving others.

subtitles.original: ああ人は滅んでゆく
subtitles.english: Ah, people are perishing.

subtitles.original: 綻んでゆく
subtitles.english: Coming apart.

subtitles.original: 元に今戻ってゆく
subtitles.english: Now returning to how it was.

subtitles.original: ああ人は泳いでゆく
subtitles.english: Ah, people are swimming.

subtitles.original: 救われてゆく
subtitles.english: Being saved.

subtitles.original: 君に逢えたから…
subtitles.english: Because I met you...

subtitles.original: 君を愛したから
subtitles.english: Because I loved you.

subtitles.original: 君が闘うなら…
subtitles.english: If you fight...

subtitles.original: 僕も闘うから…
subtitles.english: I will fight too...

subtitles.original: 我武者羅に生きるお前が笑われて
subtitles.english: You who live recklessly are laughed at,

subtitles.original: 楽に生きる奴らが徳をする世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where those who live easily benefit,

subtitles.original: 我だけはお前のことを笑わない！
subtitles.english: I alone will not laugh at you!

subtitles.original: 皆が指差し笑おうとも我は笑わない！
subtitles.english: Even if everyone points and laughs, I won't laugh!

subtitles.original: 正直に生きるお前が貶なされて
subtitles.english: You who live honestly are disparaged,

subtitles.original: 嘘で生きる奴らが徳となる世界で
subtitles.english: In a world where those who live by lies prosper,

subtitles.original: 我だけはお前の腕を離さない！
subtitles.english: I alone will not let go of your arm!

subtitles.original: 時を刻み忘れようとも我は離さない！
subtitles.english: Even if time forgets to tick, I won't let go!

subtitles.original: 我は忘れない！
subtitles.english: I will not forget!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ今夜は、この王国のお話をしていこう。
subtitles.english: Well then, tonight, I'll tell you a story of this kingdom.

subtitles.original: 嘘か真か、ここに記されている本は内容がコロコロと変わってしまう、不思議な本でね。
subtitles.english: Whether true or false, the book written here is a mysterious one whose contents change rapidly.

subtitles.original: さて、今回はどんなお話になっているかな。
subtitles.english: Now, I wonder what kind of story it's turned into this time.

subtitles.original: これはあるサーカスの一団が王国へ訪れ、
subtitles.english: This is a story of a circus troupe that visited the kingdom,

subtitles.original: まだ未熟な座長さんが、煌びやかなステージに包まれたお話。
subtitles.english: And a still-inexperienced ringmaster who was enveloped in a brilliant stage.

subtitles.original: あぁ… これが私が望んだ夢のエンディング！
subtitles.english: Ah... this is the dream ending I wanted!

subtitles.original: さあ、今日も始まりました～！
subtitles.english: Now, it's started again today~!

subtitles.original: 煌びやか、尊楽のパレード
subtitles.english: Brilliant, a parade of noble music

subtitles.original: 常識もここじゃ無関係 踊れ歌え騒げ全て忘れて
subtitles.english: Common sense is irrelevant here. Dance, sing, make a fuss, forget everything

subtitles.original: 細かいことは置いといて
subtitles.english: Put the details aside for now

subtitles.original: とりあえず身を任せてみな
subtitles.english: Just try leaving yourself to it

subtitles.original: 幸福を少し分けるような饗宴
subtitles.english: A banquet that shares a little happiness

subtitles.original: Show Time!
subtitles.english: Show Time!

subtitles.original: 積もりゆく不安や後悔
subtitles.english: Accumulating anxieties and regrets

subtitles.original: 今だけはちょっと目を背けて
subtitles.english: Just for now, turn your eyes away a bit

subtitles.original: そのままじゃ楽しめないじゃん この場だけは何もかも忘れて！
subtitles.english: You can't enjoy it like that! Forget everything just in this place!

subtitles.original: 幾千の価値観全部 引っ括め楽しませたげる！
subtitles.english: I'll make you enjoy all those thousands of values altogether!

subtitles.original: 百鬼夜行もビックリの隊を成している
subtitles.english: Forming a troupe that would even surprise the Pandemonium

subtitles.original: 怪奇模した喜劇が幕開け
subtitles.english: A comedy imitating the bizarre opens its curtains

subtitles.original: 一目見ればたちまち虜に！？
subtitles.english: A single glance and you're instantly a captive!?

subtitles.original: どんな愛も受け入れてくれる ここだけはあなたの理想郷
subtitles.english: Accepting any kind of love, only here is your utopia

subtitles.original: 「もう間もなく主役の登場、一時でも目を離さないで！」
subtitles.english: "The main character is appearing shortly, don't take your eyes off for even a moment!"

subtitles.original: 眩いほどのステージが始まる
subtitles.english: A blindingly bright stage begins

subtitles.original: 華々しいスポットライトの中 目を奪うような妙技の数々
subtitles.english: In the brilliant spotlight, many dazzling feats of skill

subtitles.original: この空間が世界で一番 “娯楽”の名に相応しいんだ！
subtitles.english: This space is the most suitable for the name "entertainment" in the world!

subtitles.original: 割れんばかりの歓声と拍手でショーは終わっていく
subtitles.english: The show ends with thunderous cheers and applause

subtitles.original: 「まあ、これはあくまで理想の話なんですが^^;」
subtitles.english: "Well, this is just an ideal story though ^^;"
